original_text: Jesus' disciples asked him, ‘Teacher, why was this man blind when he was born? Was it because he himself did something wrong? Or was it because his parents did something wrong?’
korean_text: 제자들이 물어 이르되 랍비여 이 사람이 맹인으로 난 것이 누구의 죄로 인함이니이까 자기니이까 그의 부모니이까

sentences.original_text: Was it because he himself did something wrong?
Or was it because his parents did something wrong?'
sentences.korean_translation: 아니면 그의 부모가 잘못한 것 때문입니까?'
